overview:
Steven VonDeak is co-founder of Syracuse, NY based software company AppFury, LLC.

AppFury is a mobile marketing company that promotes, develops, & services mobile apps. Specializing in location based services & location based advertising.

AppFury has developed the successful inmypocketâ„¢ brand. Our iPhone apps have been featured by Apple on iTunes as “New and Noteworthy” and have received praise from many well known app review websites.

Check out our inmypocketâ„¢ brand of iPhone Apps.

SOHOinmypocketâ„¢ - The essential iPhone App for SoHo & NoLita. Includes a categorized directory, interactive map, and deals/discounts from retailers, restaurants, hotels, and bars in New York City.

MIDTOWNinmypocketâ„¢ - The essential iPhone App for Midtown, Manhattan. Includes a categorized directory, interactive map, and deals/discounts from retailers, restaurants, hotels, and bars in New York City.
